languages.text: Once per combat allows the wearer to gain THP equal to missing HP when taking damage below 50% max HP

traits.locale_text: Once per combat allows the wearer to gain THP equal to missing HP when taking damage below 50% max HP

languages.text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, they immediately gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to their missing wounds.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} персонажа впервые за бой опускается ниже 50%, он немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, равное недостающему здоровью.

traits.locale_text: Once the wearer's wounds drop below 50% for the first time in combat, they immediately gain temporary wounds equal to their missing wounds.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı çatışmada ilk kez %50'nin altına indiğinde anında kaybettiği sağlık puanı kadar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
languages.original_text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, they immediately gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to their missing wounds.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı çatışmada ilk kez %50'nin altına indiğinde anında kaybettiği sağlık puanı kadar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanı{/g} çatışmada ilk kez %50'nin altına indiğinde anında kaybettiği sağlık puanı kadar geçici sağlık puanı kazanır.

languages.text: Cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del portador bajen del 50 % por primera vez durante el combate, gana inmediatamente tantas {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} como las que le falten.
languages.original_text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, they immediately gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to their missing wounds.

traits.locale_text: Cuando las heridas del portador bajen del 50 % por primera vez durante el combate, gana inmediatamente tantas heridas temporales como las que le falten.

languages.text: 当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}在战斗中首次降到50%以下时，会立刻获得等同于已损失生命值的{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, they immediately gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to their missing wounds.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者的生命值在战斗中首次降到50%以下时，会立刻获得等同于已损失生命值的临时生命值。

languages.text: Sinken die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Trägers im Kampf erstmals unter 50 %, erhält er sofort {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} in Höhe der fehlenden Wunden.
languages.original_text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, they immediately gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to their missing wounds.

traits.locale_text: Sinken die Wunden des Trägers im Kampf erstmals unter 50 %, erhält er sofort Temporäre Wunden in Höhe der fehlenden Wunden.

languages.text: Quand les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} du porteur passent sous la barre des 50 % pour la première fois au cours d'un combat, il gagne immédiatement des {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} à hauteur de ses blessures manquantes.
languages.original_text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, they immediately gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to their missing wounds.

traits.locale_text: Quand les blessures du porteur passent sous la barre des 50 % pour la première fois au cours d'un combat, il gagne immédiatement des blessures temporaires à hauteur de ses blessures manquantes.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が戦闘で初めて50%以下になると、即座に失った傷と同じ{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を付与される。
languages.original_text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, they immediately gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to their missing wounds.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の傷が戦闘で初めて50%以下になると、即座に失った傷と同じ一時的な傷を付与される。
使用者の傷が戦闘で初めて50%以下になると、即座に失った傷と同じ一時的な傷を付与される。

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} персонажа впервые за бой опускается ниже 50%, он немедленно получает {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, равное недостающему здоровью.
languages.original_text: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, they immediately gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to their missing wounds.

traits.locale_text: Когда здоровье персонажа впервые за бой опускается ниже 50%, он немедленно получает временное здоровье, равное недостающему здоровью.
Когда здоровье персонажа впервые за бой опускается ниже 50%, он немедленно получает временное здоровье, равное недостающему здоровью.
